'''''The Wind and The Star Traveler''''' is an original soundtrack CD for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It was released on August 4, 2021. It is the bonus CD for purchasing the [[City of Winds and Idylls (CD Set)|''City of Winds and Idylls'' CD Set]].

This CD is a physical copy of the OST album ''[[The Wind and The Star Traveler]]''.
